prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with flowing blue tentacles and a friendly expression.
I want a jellyfish-like creature that glows in the dark and has a playful demeanor.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon with a round body and long, waving appendages.
Make a blue and white Pokemon that looks soft and inviting, perfect for ocean adventures.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a jellyfish but has a mischievous personality and vibrant colors.
Design a Pokemon that floats gracefully through water, with a serene and calming presence.
Show me a ghostly Pokemon that changes shades of blue and has two large eyes.
